Historical Trend Charts with SQL

Have a look at the Drive Pilot Demo project which has been created automatically at the installation of Polarion. Using the search in the navigation bar you will find a wiki page called "Fix Time". Have a look at this wiki page and copy it's content to a new page.
Have a look at the code and find the #chartStart macro. Remove everything else from the code you do not need! 
Now you can start to implement the following logic:
  1. We will create historical trend chart
  2. Insert a parameter area on top of the page to define the number of weeks to be displayed in the trend chart
  3. Create a query which gives you the amount items in Polarion.
  4. Find out how to get the revision of a specified date.
  5. Use IDataService.sqlSearchInBaseline(String Query, String Revision) to query for items at a specified date.
    1. Hint: count is not supported in the query, so use the size() method to count the result.
  7. Finish the wiki page.
